text:
Hi Community,
Trying to get a group of products by id. I saw HS has an endpoint here:<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/products/batch-get-products>
When I use this I get an error(screenshot attached)
Is there any way to get the product id for products?
When I go to the page it says you have to use POST instead of GET.

Hello Guys, I have created a page using "Create a page API". Now I am trying to send JSON content to the page, but I don't know how can I update the page's rich text or custom modules based on the JSON content. Is there any helpful guide or sample JSON (other than the one in API Docs)??   Thanks in advance!! :slightly_smiling_face:
<@UKQP9KM8A> I changed it to post but still does not provide the product id's....
